description:
Prepayment Invoice Acknowledgment

By checking this box, you confirm that this Payment Entry will be submitted to ZATCA as a Prepayment Invoice. Please ensure the following tax line settings are correctly configured:

  • Add or Deduct: Must be set to Deduct or On Paid Amount If Sales Order Found
  • Considered in Paid Amount: Must be set to False
  • Type: Must be set to Actual

Important: When selecting Actual as the type, you are responsible for manually calculating the tax amount using the formula:

Tax Amount = Paid Amount (Paid Amount (1 + Tax Rate))

Example: For a paid amount of 10,000 SAR and a 15% tax rate:
Tax Amount = 10,000 (10,000 1.15) = 1,304.35
label: Prepayment Invoice
name: Payment Entry-custom_prepayment_invoice
